20110119000041.000|20110119000043.000|CC1|FIRED FROM A BACKPACK IN

20110119003412.000|20110119003414.000|CC1|11:00, THE PATIENT GOT HERE,

20110119005158.000|20110119005159.000|CC1|DOZENS OF SYMPATHY CARDS
